comment: Yesterday , I used for the very first time and amazed by the features this app has . You can open / close the trunk of the vehicle using the app , You don't need a key to lock / unlock the vehicle . You just need an app and Bluetooth to access the vehicle . That's it .
amr:

      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (u / use-01

                  :ARG1 ii))
      :snt2 (a4 / and

                              :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                              :ARG1 (t2 / trunk

                              :ARG1 v3))))
      :snt3 (n2 / need-01

            :purpose (a8 / access-01

                  :ARG1 v3)

      :snt4 (b2 / be-it-06
            :ARG1 (t3 / that)))

comment: Hi Deepika , it sounds like you had a great ride , we're happy that you loved our services . Happy Bouncing & Ride Safe !
